lead_paragraph: The Houston Rockets signed Dikembe Mutombo to a one-year contract, extending his N.B.A. career into a 16th season. The 7-foot-2, 260-pound Mutombo, 41, ended up playing a pivotal role for Houston last season, when Yao Ming broke a bone in his right leg and missed 33 games. Mutombo started in his place and averaged 5 points, 10 rebounds and 1.45 blocks.
